name: EOSWATCHDOGS
description: TOP 30 HARDEST WORKING BLOCK PRODUCERS -Join our community https://t.me/eoswatchdogs and help keep our network safe. Our priority is you!

EOSIO.name: Ferdous Bhai's proxy
EOSIO.description: Voting criteria: 1) Non-interventionist approach to base-layer governance, 2) Technical competency, 3) Bare metal rigs

EOSIO.name: Luke Stokes
EOSIO.description: I vote for BPs who provide value to the EOS ecosystem through innovation, education, and helping the world advance forward.

EOSIO.name: TIMM (Mentor Market)
EOSIO.description: Pursuing integrity, strong community and real added value.

EOSIO.name: Sole One
EOSIO.description: Voting for BPs that strengthen the community by actually building tools or engaging in governance or education. Avoid anonymous whale, but not all whales are necessarily bad, it depends. Life is complicated. Both Cloud and Bare Metal is fine, diversity in BP architecture is important.

EOSIO.name: Good Guys 4 EOS Proxy
EOSIO.description: We vote for BPs who (1) have received below 1% of total network votes, (2) adhere to the {{ regproducer }} agreement, (3) adhere to the Constitution and (4) actively participate in the EOS community.
